documentText:
MHP Brand Compliance Report

Executive Summary
This report outlines the key findings from our brand compliance audit.

Findings
1. Document formatting inconsistencies
2. Brand style violations
3. Missing required headers
formatRules:
All documents must:
- Use MHP Heading 1 for main section titles
- Use MHP Heading 2 for subsections
- Use Arial 12pt for body text
- Include MHP Title style for document title
- Follow left alignment for all text
- Use consistent spacing (1.5 line height)
